title: Riot please do something....
body: Please do something about nerfing Zoe, the damage or the E duration and cooldown. And also the fact that everyone can get a zonyas at level 1 is so tiliting beyond belief, please in your next patch do something about these things, the game is so broken right now, builidng full tank can outdamage armor pen lanes its so bs! Ok rant over

replies.body: Legit so strong but no nerfs :(
Lol what she has gotten nerfed 3 times ;-;
Zoe is trash, legit useless in high mmr games. She's only good for stomping noobs.
